# The `VPWidenCastRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpwidencastrecipe">VPWidenCastRecipe</a> is a recipe to create vector cast instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpwidencastrecipe">VPWidenCastRecipe</a> is a recipe to create vector cast instructions.

Definition at line 1533 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
